message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $115. I think it would really be valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $110 is the lowest I can go.  It's a fantastic product and well worth the price.
Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
